pages.text: $(li)The Spore Bomb is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt)TNT$(/l).$(br)$(li)It doesn't break blocks when explodes, but it spawns an area of green spores.
$(li)In a few seconds, a horde of 8 $(l:patchouli:pets/savage_and_ravage/creepie)Creepies$(/l) will appear in that area.
